title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG podcast episode with Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska outlines practical AI use in audit, showing how tools automate repetitive tasks, analyze large datasets and support decision-making. They discuss KPMG Clara and Clara AI assistants, full-population analysis, client-facing communication, changing auditor roles, implementation challenges, data security, regulation and future risks.
bullets: Shift from sampling to full-population analysis (AI Transaction Scoring Tool).
Clara AI provides conversational assistants and specialized agents to support auditors.
KPMG Clara platform enables real-time audit management; Clara for Clients modernizes client communication.
AI supports documentation, disclosure analysis and automation of repetitive tasks.
Key challenges: auditor adaptation, data security, regulatory environment and potential AI risks.
takeaways: Expect audits to use full-population analytics rather than traditional sampling approaches.
Prepare for more real-time, interactive audit processes via platforms and client portals.
Prioritize data security and regulatory compliance when sharing data with AI-enabled audit tools.
Anticipate changes in auditor skills and interactions as AI reshapes audit workflows.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot provides real-time visual support for home projects and repairs. It can see what you see and offers step-by-step instructions and clear guidance for problems such as leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines.
bullets: Real-time support that uses visual context (it can see what you see).
Provides step-by-step instructions for repairs and projects.
Aims to give clear, actionable guidance to users.
Example scenarios listed: leaky pipes and overflowing washing machines.
Positioned for hands-on, in-the-moment troubleshooting.
takeaways: The description emphasizes real-time visual context as a core feature.
Step-by-step, actionable instructions are central to the product messaging.
Household repair examples show a focus on practical, field-level guidance.
For decision-makers, the described attributes highlight an emphasis on visual troubleshooting and guided workflows.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach in Portland who has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases and traveling while pet sitting full time to live rent-free and earn about $60,000 a year. The video is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series profiling how people earn, spend and save their money.
bullets: Lives rent-free in Portland by pet sitting full time.
Has been traveling and living out of two suitcases for 18 months.
Brings in approximately $60,000 per year from this arrangement.
Is a 35-year-old financial coach featured by CNBC Make It.
Segment is part of the Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Highlights location-independent income models that could influence workforce distribution—consider flexible capacity planning.
Shows a gig-economy approach yielding a mid-six-figure lifestyle component, suggesting demand for reliable remote connectivity and services.
Profiles mobile, travel-heavy lifestyles that may shift usage patterns away from fixed office hubs—evaluate regional load and redundancy.
Content emphasis on flexibility and remote income could indicate growing expectations for seamless mobile access and on-demand services.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description, a giant bubble of carbon dioxide can store 20 megawatts of energy. The description states these batteries are meant to help manage fluctuating renewable generation and to power the global shift to clean energy.
bullets: A CO2 "bubble" battery is reported to store 20 megawatts of energy.
Intended to address variability in renewable energy output.
Positioned as a tool to support the transition to clean energy worldwide.
No transcript available; summary is based solely on the provided description.
takeaways: 20 MW capacity indicates a multi-megawatt storage option worth tracking for grid-scale applications.
Designed to smooth renewable fluctuations, so it could play a role in improving supply reliability during variable generation.
Decision-makers should monitor technology maturity and availability to assess future procurement or pilot opportunities.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych – jak wykorzystać jej potencjał? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG podcast hosts Monika Palmowska and Jakub Roszkiewicz discuss how AI is impacting transfer pricing, from profitability monitoring and comparative analyses to automating documentation. They cover practical implementation steps, integration with ERP, data/security risks (including GDPR and hallucinations), and argue AI will augment rather than replace tax advisors.
bullets: AI applications: monitoring rentability, benchmarking, and automating transfer pricing documentation.
AI complements tax advisors—strengthening workflows and supporting junior staff development.
Key risks discussed: data quality, security, GDPR compliance and AI hallucinations.
Secure environments like Digital Gateway and ERP integration are highlighted as enablers.
First implementation steps: organize processes, define personas, and follow pillars of AI deployment.
takeaways: Prioritize secure, compliant environments (e.g., Digital Gateway) before deploying AI tools.
Ensure ERP and benchmarking systems can integrate with AI to realize automated monitoring and analytics.
Address data governance and GDPR requirements up front to mitigate security and compliance risks.
Treat AI as an augmentation tool—plan for staff upskilling and clearer process ownership rather than replacement.
Start implementations by ordering processes and defining personas to create a stable foundation for AI adoption.
